titlestmt.titleproper: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Women's Committee records 1977-2004
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Women's Committee records

bioghist.p: The Women's Committee of the Academy of Natural Sciences. The purpose of the committee is to further the aims of the Academy by undertaking projects or programs which will stimulate public interest and help the activities of the Academy.

scopecontent.p: This collection documents the activities of the Women's Committee of the Academy of Natural Sciences from 1977 to 2004. Materials include: monthly meeting minutes 1977-1987 and 1990-1999; budget information and records of donations; special events planning materials, including schedules, correspondence, and mailing lists; invitations, brochures and pamphlets; newspaper clippings; Academy publications, including copies of the Academy News; and annual reports of the Academy. The collection also includes audio, film (housed with the Academy's A/V materials), photos, slides, and disks related to various special events and development initiatives coordinated by the Women's Committee.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia: Women's Committee records (collection 786) and Development Office records.
